projects.title: Veracruz
projects.info: E-commerce virtual clothing store built with JavaScript utilizing technologies like React.js, Zustand, Emotion, Bumbag UI, and PayPal API.

projects.title: Tic Tac Toe
projects.info: Terminal application where you can play Tic Tac Toe on the terminal against the computer. Built with vanilla Java.

projects.title: Liri
projects.info: Liri will search Spotify for songs, Bands in Town for concerts, and OMDB for movies. Node.js, Axios, and Moment.js were utilized to build the app.

projects.title: Weather Forecast
projects.info: Back-end application that checks what are the sky's conditions and other features based on user data. Created with vanilla Java.

projects.title: C++ Programming
projects.info: Various solutions to the book C++ Programming (From Problem Analyis to Program Design) by D. S. Malik using vanilla C++.
